players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is dead, so we have 3 players left - one mafioso among us three. We need to be very careful with our vote since the mafia only needs to eliminate one more person to win."
Diana: "Alice is right - we're in a critical situation. I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We need to vote Bob out immediately to win."

Bob: "Diana is trying to frame me! Think about it - if she was really the detective and knew I was mafia, why would she announce it so boldly? A real detective would be more careful. Diana is the mafioso trying to eliminate me!"

You: "Diana, if you're really the detective, you would know that revealing yourself this early puts you at huge risk. But we have no choice - if you're lying, we lose. I'm voting Bob based on your claim."
Diana: "Bob, you're panicking because you know I caught you. Alice is right - I had to reveal myself because we're at the tipping point. If we don't vote you out now, you win tonight. Vote Bob!"

Bob: "Alice, think carefully! Diana could easily be lying - there's no way to verify her detective claim. If I'm really mafia, why would I kill Charlie instead of the detective? Diana is the real mafioso manipulating you!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
